channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1446; 08:43PM; 4161 S Vermont Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TeJuhG; #VermontSquare; Firefighters investigated smoke found on the first and second floor, and spreading throughout the building. It took 80 firefighters 37 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. Crews set up a system of blowers to remove the smoke and reintroduce fresh air into the building. Thankfully, there were no reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E15 E215 E221 E227 E266 E27 E33 E46 E66 E95 EA1 EM11 HR3 RA46 RA846 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T15 T21 T27 T66 UR27 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1446; 08:06PM; 4161 S Vermont Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TeJuhG; #VermontSquare; Two-story residential-over-commercial building with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E11 E15 E215 E266 E46 E66 RA46 RA846 SO1 SQ21 T15 T66; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Hazardous Condition; INC#1115; 07:00PM; 1445 N Bundy Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SPWCrR; #Brentwood; Fire crews have now left the incident. Building and Safety performed an initial assessment and will be sending out a specialist within 48 hours for an additional slope assessment. Responders on scene were in close communication with residents, explaining the situation and findings. No official evacuation order was given. No reported injuries. Additional questions are referred to LA Department of Building and Safety. Nothing further.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 CM20 CM22 CM40 CM42 E19 E37 UR88; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Hazardous Condition; INC#1115; 04:16PM; 1445 N Bundy Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SPWCrR; #Brentwood; LAFD received a 9-1-1 call due to concern a hillside near homes may be slipping/moving. Crews arrived and are on scene assessing the situation. Department of Building and Safety is also responding with a Geologist to conduct an assessment. Firefighters are in close communication with residents in the immediate area (approximately 5 homes in the vicinity). There is currently no evacuation order. There is no widespread or escalating hazard.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 CM20 CM22 CM40 CM42 E19 E37 UR88; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0627; 11:38AM; 13852 W Louvre St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IbeDMp; #Pacoima; Firefighters responded to a one-story home with smoke showing. Firefighters discovered an outside (cooking?) fire had extended into the home's attic. It took 36 firefighters 19 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. One adult female was evaluated for symptoms related to minor smoke inhalation, and declined hospital transport. No firefighter injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 E275 E75 E81 E87 E91 RA89 RA891 SO1 T75 T87; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0627; 11:19AM; 10650 N Amboy Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/49rGZ0T; #Pacoima; One-story single-family home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 E275 E75 E81 E87 E91 RA89 RA891 SO1 T75 T87; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1703; 10:07PM; 15702 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3STRrXY; Van Nuys; Firefighters responded to reports of an auto fire near a single story 70' x 30' vacant auto dealership. Crews arrived to find smoke showing from the structure and requested additional resources as they advanced hose lines and made forcible entry into the building. It took 32 firefighters 15 minutes to access, confine and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC15 E275 E290 E7 E81 E90 RA7 RA90 T75 T90; CH9; 17; Jennifer Middleton

Traffic; INC#0407; 08:33AM; 757 E Florence Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OW3Md8; Florence; Firefighters responded to a three vehicle traffic accident with trapped patients. Two adult patients in critical condition and two patients with non-life threatening injuries were transported to local hospitals. ; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E21 E221 E233 E33 EM11 EM13 RA33 RA46 RA815 RA833 RA864 RA865 RA915 T21 T33; CH4; 12; Jennifer Middleton

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1562; 07:47PM; 3104 E Ganahl St; MAP: https://bit.ly/42WK72A; #BoyleHeights; 43 LAFD Firefighters with the support of LACoFD took just 19 minutes to access, confine and extinguish flames in one upstairs unit of a two-story residential duplex. No human injury. Firefighters are now caring for two puppies they rescued from the burning building. As this location at the City/County border has now been determined to be within the Los Angeles County Fire Department's jurisdiction, all further information will come from LACoFD.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E1 E16 E201 E202 E4 E450 RA1 RA2 RA801 SO1 SQ21 T1 T2 + LACoFD; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1562; 07:28PM; 3104 E Ganahl St; MAP: https://bit.ly/42WK72A; #BoyleHeights; PRELIM: Offensive fire attack at a two-story multi-family dwelling with fire on the second floor.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E1 E16 E201 E202 E4 RA1 RA801 SQ21 T1 T2; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey
